name: Sweat-er Shop
description:
Game made for the UW Games Institute Game Jam Winter 2023. The theme roots inspired this game due to the Canadian clothing manufacturer and retailer "Roots" who is known to have less than ideal working conditions.

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Interact: Space

Sneeze on command: T

Programming and game design: Julian O'Grady : Umi#7947

Assets: [355755](https://github.com/355755)

Music and Sound Design: Jonathan Shim : shimmer#4947

https://github.com/Umi-L/Fast-Fashion
